Bottle Service.name: Bottle Service
Bottle Service.desc: Bottles, used to buy maps to new islands, wash up at the docks +10% more often.

Random Garbage.name: Random Garbage
Random Garbage.desc: All random event bosses now drop Garbage Piles to give to the Garbage Tuna.

Fishermaster.name: Fishermaster
Fishermaster.desc: +25% Fishing EXP, and +15% Fishing Efficiency, now and forever.

Godlier Creation.name: Godlier Creation
Godlier Creation.desc: The Godly Creation talent now gives up to +12 Stat bonus, instead of up to +4

Star Scraper.name: Star Scraper
Star Scraper.desc: Get +33 Star Talent points, right now, for all characters, no questions asked.

The Art of the Grail.name: The Art of the Grail
The Art of the Grail.desc: Look buddy, I ain't got no more bribes, maybe an associate of mine will sort it out later...

desc: Look, I'm in a bit of a situation right now and need time to clean it up... come back later.
You must unlock the next Bribe Set from the Garbage Tuna on Trash Island in World 2.
